Sentencas: Effective and scalable recycling strategies for the recovery of critical raw materials are yet to be validated for solid oxide cells (SOCs) technologies.
Titulo: Hydrothermally-assisted recovery of Yttria- stabilized zirconia (YSZ) from end-of-life solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The current study aimed at filling this gap by developing optimized recycling processes for the recovery of Yttria-stabilized Zirconia (YSZ) from End-of-Life (EoL) SOC components, in view of using the recovered ceramic phase in cell remanufacturing.
Titulo: Hydrothermally-assisted recovery of Yttria- stabilized zirconia (YSZ) from end-of-life solid oxide cells

Sentencas: A multi-step procedure, including milling, hydrothermal treatment (HT), and acidic-assisted leaching of nickel from composite Ni-YSZ materials, has been implemented to obtain recovered YSZ powders with defined specifications, in terms of particle size distribution, specific surface area, and chemical purity.
Titulo: Hydrothermally-assisted recovery of Yttria- stabilized zirconia (YSZ) from end-of-life solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The overall optimized procedure includes a pre-milling step (6 h) of the EoL composite materials, and a hydrothermal (HT) treatment at 200 ?
Titulo: Hydrothermally-assisted recovery of Yttria- stabilized zirconia (YSZ) from end-of-life solid oxide cells

Sentencas: for 4 h to further disaggregate the sintered composite, followed by selective oxidative leaching of Ni2+ by HNO3 solution at 80 ?
Titulo: Hydrothermally-assisted recovery of Yttria- stabilized zirconia (YSZ) from end-of-life solid oxide cells
Hydrothermally-assisted recovery of Yttria- stabilized zirconia (YSZ) from end-of-life solid oxide cells

Sentencas: In particular, the intermediate HT step was assessed to play an essential role in promoting the disaggregation of the sintered powders, with a related increase of specific surface area (up to 13 m2 g-1) and the overall reduction of the primary particle aggregates.
Titulo: Hydrothermally-assisted recovery of Yttria- stabilized zirconia (YSZ) from end-of-life solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The acid-assisted leaching allowed to fully extract Nickel from the composite Ni-YSZ powders, with retention of YSZ crystallinity and negligible loss of Zr and Y, as revealed by ICP analysis on the recovered supernatants.
Titulo: Hydrothermally-assisted recovery of Yttria- stabilized zirconia (YSZ) from end-of-life solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The developed multi-step pathway offers a promising strategy to recover valuable YSZ materials for the re -manufacturing of SOCs components, with the aim to boost a circular economy approach in the field of fuel -cell and hydrogen (FCH) technologies.
Titulo: Hydrothermally-assisted recovery of Yttria- stabilized zirconia (YSZ) from end-of-life solid oxide cells
